ShapeMap to sf Polygon map

Source: R/sfConversions.R
shapeMapToPolygonSf.Rd

Convert a ShapeMap to an sf Polygon map

Usage

shapeMapToPolygonSf(shapeMap)

Arguments

shapeMap

A ShapeMap

Value

A new sf Polygon map

Examples

mifFile <- system.file(
    "extdata", "testdata", "simple",
    "simple_interior.mif",
    package = "alcyon"
  )
  sfMap <- st_read(mifFile,
    geometry_column = 1L, quiet = TRUE
  )
  shapeMap <- as(sfMap[, vector()], "ShapeMap")
isovistMap <- isovist(
  shapeMap,
  x = c(3.01, 1.3),
  y = c(6.70, 5.2),
  angle = 0.01,
  viewAngle = 3.14,
  FALSE
)
shapeMapToPolygonSf(isovistMap)
#> Simple feature collection with 2 features and 9 fields
#> Geometry type: POLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: 1.888668 ymin: 1.544019 xmax: 7.89713 ymax: 6.908548
#> CRS:           NA
